page.title: List of recurring The Simpsons characters

rev.comment: /* Cecil Terwilliger */ no rationale for this use, and probably not allowed anyway
rev.diff:
Line 29: Line 29:
==Cecil Terwilliger==
==Cecil Terwilliger==
â   â
[[Image:Cecil and Bob.png|thumb|left|200px|Cecil (right) with [[Sideshow Bob|Bob]] in "[[Brother from Another Series]]."]]
  â  
'''Cecil Terwilliger''', voiced by [[David Hyde Pierce]], is the younger brother of [[Sideshow Bob]]. He appears in the [[The Simpsons (season 8)|eighth season]] episode "[[Brother from Another Series]]" and [[The Simpsons (season 19)|season nineteen]]'s "[[Funeral for a Fiend]]." "Brother from Another Series" was written by [[Ken Keeler]], who had "been watching a lot of ''Frasier'' at the time," and conceived the idea to do an episode involving Bob's brother.<ref name="Keeler">{{cite video | people=Keeler, Ken|year=2006|title=The Simpsons season 8 DVD commentary for the episode "Brother from Another Series"| medium=DVD||publisher=20th Century Fox}}</ref> In "Funeral for a Fiend," Cecil, Bob, their parents, and Bob's wife and son partake in Bob's scheme to murder [[Bart Simpson]]. (Their father was voiced by [[John Mahoney]], who played the Pierce and Grammer's father on ''Frasier''.) <ref name="Futon">{{cite news | author = | title = SIDESHOW BOB and family RETURN for the ultimate simpsons revenge on "the simpsons" sunday, NOVEMBER 25, on fox | publisher = The Futon Critic | url = http://www.thefutoncritic.com/listings.aspx?id=20071102fox16| accessdate=2007-11-26}}</ref>
'''Cecil Terwilliger''', voiced by [[David Hyde Pierce]], is the younger brother of [[Sideshow Bob]]. He appears in the [[The Simpsons (season 8)|eighth season]] episode "[[Brother from Another Series]]" and [[The Simpsons (season 19)|season nineteen]]'s "[[Funeral for a Fiend]]." "Brother from Another Series" was written by [[Ken Keeler]], who had "been watching a lot of ''Frasier'' at the time," and conceived the idea to do an episode involving Bob's brother.<ref name="Keeler">{{cite video | people=Keeler, Ken|year=2006|title=The Simpsons season 8 DVD commentary for the episode "Brother from Another Series"| medium=DVD||publisher=20th Century Fox}}</ref> In "Funeral for a Fiend," Cecil, Bob, their parents, and Bob's wife and son partake in Bob's scheme to murder [[Bart Simpson]]. (Their father was voiced by [[John Mahoney]], who played the Pierce and Grammer's father on ''Frasier''.) <ref name="Futon">{{cite news | author = | title = SIDESHOW BOB and family RETURN for the ultimate simpsons revenge on "the simpsons" sunday, NOVEMBER 25, on fox | publisher = The Futon Critic | url = http://www.thefutoncritic.com/listings.aspx?id=20071102fox16| accessdate=2007-11-26}}</ref>
